===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Dori)
:{{A|vo card dori invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Why, certainly! Anything for my favorite customer! Hehehe~
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Let me adjust my deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Dori's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card dori ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Not bad. But if you're trying to intimidate me, keep trying.

;(When the player defeats two of Dori's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card dori ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Hmmm... I need to make my next card count...

;(When Dori defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card dori ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Hehehe! You know, it's never too late to admit defeat!

;(When Dori uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card dori ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Pleasure doing business with you!

;(If the player wins the match)

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card dori invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Dori:''' Nothing can stop Lord Sangemah Bay's good fortune today, hahaha!
{{Dialogue End}}
